title: How to Make Strawberry Nutella Muffins

steps.headline: Preheat the oven to 350 degrees F (176 degrees C)
Grease a muffin pan well or line with muffin papers.
In a medium bowl, mix together the flour, sugar, baking powder and salt.
In a small bowl, beat the egg and mix with milk, oil and vanilla.
Mix both preparations in a larger bowl, then add the chopped strawberries, along with the Nutella.
Fill the muffin pan with the preparation and put in the oven.
Bake for 18 to 20 minutes.
steps.description: Stick a toothpick in the center of one and if it comes out clean, it's done.

steps.headline: Remove from the oven and allow to cool for 5 minutes.

text: Preheat the oven to 350 degrees F (176 degrees C)  Grease a muffin pan well or line with muffin papers.  In a medium bowl, mix together the flour, sugar, baking powder and salt.  In a small bowl, beat the egg and mix with milk, oil and vanilla.  Mix both preparations in a larger bowl, then add the chopped strawberries, along with the Nutella.  Fill the muffin pan with the preparation and put in the oven.  Bake for 18 to 20 minutes. Stick a toothpick in the center of one and if it comes out clean, it's done. Remove from the oven and allow to cool for 5 minutes.  Serve warm.
